alert.note: Alert for Kaibab Plateau (Arizona) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued November 08 at 9:12PM MST until November 09 at 6:00PM MST by NWS Flagstaff
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 6 AM TO 6 PM MST WEDNESDAY ABOVE 6000 FEET... * WHAT...Periods of snow, heavy at times. Total accumulations of 2 to 8 inches, with 8 to 11 inches above 7500 feet. * WHERE...Areas above 6000 feet on the Kaibab Plateau, including Jacob Lake. * WHEN...From 6 AM to 6 PM MST Wednesday. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. Patchy blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Southwest winds of 20 to 30 mph, with gusts as high as 50 mph, may cause areas of blowing and drifting snow, along with near zero visibility at times. Snow forecast from 6 AM Wednesday to 6 PM Wednesday: Jacob Lake 5 to 9 inches
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.
